name: pfp
description: Creates an animated gif for you to use as your profile picture

options.name: id
options.description: Smol or Swol ID (uses Smol by default)

options.name: delay
options.description: A value between 1 and 100 for the speed of the gif. Lower means faster!

options.name: reverse
options.description: Whether to loop the gif from last frame back to first frame

options.name: type
options.description: Pick whether this is for a smol or a swol
